Well, the major factions are:

The Alliance, at the Alliance base, led by Zardus.
Maximals at the Cybertronian Fire, led by Iron Raptor.
Predacons at the Predacon Base, led by Black Arachnia.
Predacons at Destroctus' base, led by KitKat.
The Chosen ones, no base, led by either Shockaract or Deemos, I'm not 
sure.

Those are the five biggest, there are also lots of smaller ones. 
Destrons, Lavacons, and the like.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" 
<airshadow_nightlight@h...> wrote:
